org.lainsoft.forge.flow.helper

Interface ViewHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AjaxViewHelper, GenericViewHelper

    public interface ViewHelper
    Interface of a helper, defines a wraper for the HttpServletRequest, HttpSession and ServletContext. It must be an specific implementation for the view interaction.

      • save_from_request

        boolean save_from_request(org.lainsoft.commons.beanutils.ValidatedBean bean)
                          throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Saves mapped parameters in the request to a ValidatedBean.
        Parameters:
        bean - ValidatedBean wich will be filled.
        Returns:
        true if saving was successful or false if saving have errors.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException

      • search_params_for

        java.util.Map search_params_for(java.lang.String obj)
        Search param with the prefix pattern described. For example:
        - if you specify "Line" the method will look for Line[whatever] pattern.
        Parameters:
        obj - pattern to search for.
        Returns:
        Map with the parameters found.

      • real_path

        java.lang.String real_path(java.lang.String seudo_path)
        Returns the web application file system path for the seudo path given. For example:
        - helper.real_path("/WEB-INF/web.xml"); will return /my_file_system/path/.../app_server/my_webapp/WEB-INF/web.xml
        Parameters:
        seudo_path - the seudo path to evaluate.
        Returns:
        The real file system path for the seudo path.

      • is_empty

        boolean is_empty(java.lang.Object obj)
        Evaluates if an object is empty
        Parameters:
        obj - to evaluate.
        Returns:
        true if the object is empty (this could mean null or empty), false if the object is filled.

        Obtains a request parameter
        Parameters:

      • getParameter

        java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String param,
                            java.lang.String def)
        Obtains a request parameter, if null returns given the default value.
        Parameters:
        param - Parameter name to search for.
        def - default value if parameter value is empty or not present.
        Returns:
        the value assigned to this parameter.

        Obtains a file request parameter.

        Returns:
        FileItem related to this request parameter.
